title: Need 8 RP please riot?
body:
The worst month possible for me to buy RP (and I stupidly last week even gifted ARAM skins ) NOT REALISING Traditional Karma is available in my shop!!!!!!

i can just about buy the 450 RP for Â£2.50 but with my remaining 29RP I am 8 RP short.

Riot please, could you gift me the 8RP????

replies.body: We might be able to help!  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) or [Twitter](https://twitter.com/RiotSupport), and we'll see if we can work something out.  :)
I did it, help me out Porocles become a Traditional Karma Skin using {{champion:43}}  main who terrorises bot support (and occasional mid lane and maybe top) "Blabla Terravi <3 "

Tbh, you can't really go wrong with any of Karma's skins. They're all so beautiful *grossly sobs*

I hope the specialist that gets your ticket will make your dreams come true :)

But its only Traditional Karmas voiceover that gets me.....

I play {{champion:51}}  purely for her British VO although some may suggest Im a rubbish ADC....
Karma mains spotted.  >.>  And a leviosa to you as well, friends!
